title: Cosmic Dream
description: An abstract representation of a nebula, exploring the interplay of light and shadow in the vastness of space. Created using a mix of digital painting and generative art techniques.

title: Forest Spirit
description: A handmade sketch capturing a mystical creature in a serene forest setting. The goal was to evoke a sense of wonder and tranquility.

title: City at Dusk
description: A photograph capturing the vibrant city lights of Dhaka as evening descends. Long exposure was used to create light trails and a dynamic mood.

title: Serenity UI Kit
description: A clean and minimalist UI kit designed for a meditation and wellness app. The design focuses on calming colors and intuitive navigation to create a peaceful user experience.

title: Organic Coffee Branding
description: Branding and packaging design for a new organic coffee brand. The design uses earthy tones and hand-drawn illustrations to emphasize the natural quality of the product.

title: The Wanderer
description: Digital illustration of a lone traveler exploring a vast, alien landscape. This piece plays with scale and atmosphere to tell a story of discovery.
